modloader.twitchspawn.error.title: §nTwitchSpawn Loading Errors
commands.twitchspawn.reloadcfg.success: §3>> 成功重新載入所有配置
commands.twitchspawn.reloadcfg.already_s: §4>> TwitchSpawn should be stopped in order to be able to reload configs.
commands.twitchspawn.reloadcfg.no_perm: §4>> You do not have permission to reload TwitchSpawn configs.
commands.twitchspawn.start.success: §a>> TwitchSpawn is now started on this server!
commands.twitchspawn.start.no_perm: §4>> You do not have permission to start TwitchSpawn.
commands.twitchspawn.stop.no_perm: §4>> You do not have permission to stop TwitchSpawn.
commands.twitchspawn.simulate.missing: §4>> Missing event name in simulation object. Expected \event\ field.
commands.twitchspawn.simulate.no_perm: §4>> You do not have permission to simulate an event.
commands.twitchspawn.test.no_perm: §4>> You do not have permission to test rulesets.
commands.twitchspawn.execute.no_perm: §4>> You do not have permission to execute actions.
